description:
“I want to become your thrall…!”

A crossdressing girl and doting vampire’s dangerous cohabitation is about to begin!

After losing her parents and being abandoned by her relatives, Mito is left all alone in the world. When she’s kicked out of the restaurant where she works with no money and no place to live, she is taken in by Ruka, a vampire. In exchange for giving Ruka her blood as his “food,” she ends up living with him in a boys’ dorm full of beautiful boys with unique personalities…?!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: แวมไพร์ในหอพักชาย

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Boarding School
tags.description: Features characters attending a boarding school.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Netorare
tags.description: Netorare is what happens when the protagonist gets their partner stolen from them by someone else. It is a sexual fetish designed to cause sexual jealousy by way of having the partner indulge in sexual activity with someone other than the protagonist.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

node.description:
[Website](http://emaema.sakura.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tooyamatsuri) 

Made her debut in September 2003 in the monthly manga magazine Nakayoshi with their story, Tenshi no Tamago ("Angel's Egg", no relation to the anime movie of the same name). Gokkun! Pūcho is considered her best representative work. Tokyopop has licensed it under the title Pixie Pop. All of her works are published by Kodansha, and they are enjoyed mainly by preteen and teen girls.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

name.native: エヴリ・リトル・シング

node.description: **Every Little Thing** is a Japanese pop rock duo consisting of **Kaori Mochida** and **Ichiro Ito** who debuted in August 1996.

FANTASTICS is part of the collective supergroup EXILE TRIBE and composed of 8 members: 2 vocalists and 6 performers. The group was formed in 2016 as a performance unit with two EXILE members and 5 EXPG students. In late 2017, two vocalists were added from the VOCAL BATTLE AUDITION 5.

They made their major debut on December 5, 2018, with the single "OVER DRIVE". (Source: EXILE TRIBE Wiki)

Members as of May 2023: [Sekai](https://anilist.co/staff/337395) · Taiki Sato · Natsuki Sawamoto · Leiya Seguchi · Natsuki Hori · Keito Kimura · Yusei Yagi · Sota Nakajima

Forner Member: Nakao Shota (passed away on July 6, 2018, at a hospital in Tokyo due to complications of stomach cancer)
